text: Mario & Sonic at the Sochi 2014 Olympic Winter Games is a sports game for the Wii U. It is the fourth Mario & Sonic crossover game. It is the official video game of the 2014 Olympic Winter Games, which took place in Sochi. It was also the first game in the series that was not released on a handheld console. ==Reception== The game got very average reviews. It got a 55/100 on Metacritic. IGN's Scott Thompson said "[The game] has some good ideas but it's weighed down by bad motion controls". Metro gave it a 3/10, saying it was too similar to the other games in the series. ==References== Category:2013 video games Category:Mario sports games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog games Category:Nintendo Network games Category:Party video games Category:Sports video games Category:Wii U games
